post.title: panasonic viera cast
post.content: hi i have just bought a netgear wireless adaptor to connect my viera tv to viera connect. i have tried both wired and wireless connections and in each case i get an error saying "cannot connect etc (005)" i have had a look at my router settings (a bt open hub) and all looks ok in terms of network i have run the connection tests and all tests are passed is the sever down? is this a regular issue people have seen? cheers for all your help
